name: Springboard Swordsman
description:
- Description -

Use springs to help guide a clueless knight in this lighthearted 2D puzzle platformer. Explore the unique realms and help rid the ensuing goblin threat. Use your limited time and resources to find the best path to eliminate all of the goblins in the level.

- Includes -

  • utilize a precise movement system to glide around the level.
  • test your critical with time-based puzzles.
  • explore the three unique realms with a mix of pixel art and pre-rendered 3D.
  • enemy variations and game-changing mechanics.

- Bio -

I am a game designer currently studying at Media Design School, New Zealand. I like to make freaky/unique type games.

MOVEJUMPPLACE SPRINGSPEED UP TIMERRESET LEVELESCWASD / Arrow KeysSpaceEEnterTabPause
